FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Apparel 1: Tanning Workshop
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: A workshop designed to turn animal hides into leather. +15% apparel production. -15% animal production.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Apparel 3: Textile Factory
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Making clothes is so much easier when machines do most of the work! +.5 base apparel production. 250 silver per tax period upkeep.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Apparel 4: Clothing Printers
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Remove the human element altogether! Dump raw materials in and watch as each article of clothing is printed as a single, seamless piece! +50% apparel production.
